languages.text: All enemies in a 6-cell radius around the target point, up to 12 cells away from the Navigator, must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or immediately move 3 cells toward that point. The targets move even if they are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.
languages.original_text: Все противники в радиусе 6 клеток от выбранной точки на расстоянии до 12 клеток от навигатора должны выполнить проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала немедленно переместиться на 3 клетки по направлению к этой точке. Перемещаются даже {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушенные{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвиженные{/g} цели.

traits.locale_text: All enemies in a 6-cell radius around the target point must pass a Willpower resistance check or immediately move 3 cells toward that point. The targets move even if they are stunned or immobilised.

All enemies in a 6-cell radius around the target point, up to 12 cells away from the Navigator, must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or immediately move 3 cells toward that point. The targets move even if they are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.

All enemies in a 6-cell radius around the target point, up to 12 cells away from the Navigator, must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or immediately move 3 cells toward that point. The targets move even if they are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.

All enemies in a 6-cell radius around the target point must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or immediately move 3 cells toward that point. The targets move even if they are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.

Перемещаются даже {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушенные{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвиженные{/g} цели.
languages.original_text: All enemies in a 6-cell radius around the target point, up to 12 cells away from the Navigator, must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or immediately move 3 cells toward that point. The targets move even if they are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Все противники в радиусе 6 клеток от выбранной точки на расстоянии до 12 клеток от навигатора должны выполнить проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала немедленно переместиться на 3 клетки по направлению к этой точке. Перемещаются даже {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушенные{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвиженные{/g} цели.

Все противники в радиусе 6 клеток от выбранной точки должны пройти проверку на сопротивление Воли и в случае провала немедленно переместиться на 3 клетки по направлению к этой точке. Перемещаются даже оглушенные и обездвиженные цели.

Все противники в радиусе 6 клеток от выбранной точки на расстоянии до 12 клеток от навигатора должны выполнить проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала немедленно переместиться на 3 клетки по направлению к этой точке. Перемещаются даже {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушенные{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвиженные{/g} цели.

languages.text: 目标点周围6格内所有敌人需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，与导航者的距离不得超过12格。若检定失败，则会立刻朝目标区域移动3格。即便是{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}状态的敌人也会移动。
languages.original_text: All enemies in a 6-cell radius around the target point, up to 12 cells away from the Navigator, must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or immediately move 3 cells toward that point. The targets move even if they are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 目标点周围6格内所有敌人需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，与导航者的距离不得超过12格。若检定失败，则会立刻朝目标区域移动3格。即便是{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}状态的敌人也会移动。

languages.text: Todos los enemigos situados en un radio de 6 casillas alrededor del punto objetivo, a hasta 12 casillas de distancia del navegante, deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} o de lo contrario se moverán inmediatamente 3 casillas hacia ese punto. Los objetivos se mueven incluso aunque estén {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdidos{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizados{/g}.
languages.original_text: All enemies in a 6-cell radius around the target point, up to 12 cells away from the Navigator, must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or immediately move 3 cells toward that point. The targets move even if they are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Todos los enemigos situados en un radio de 6 casillas alrededor del punto objetivo, a hasta 12 casillas de distancia del navegante, deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} o de lo contrario se moverán inmediatamente 3 casillas hacia ese punto. Los objetivos se mueven incluso aunque estén {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdidos{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizados{/g}.

languages.text: Alle Gegner in einem Radius von 6 Feldern um den Zielpunkt, die maximal 12 Felder vom Navigator entfernt sind, müssen eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} bestehen oder sich sofort 3 Felder in Richtung dieses Punktes bewegen. Die Ziele bewegen sich auch dann, wenn sie {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}betäubt{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}gelähmt{/g} sind.
languages.original_text: All enemies in a 6-cell radius around the target point, up to 12 cells away from the Navigator, must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or immediately move 3 cells toward that point. The targets move even if they are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Alle Gegner in einem Radius von 6 Feldern um den Zielpunkt, die maximal 12 Felder vom Navigator entfernt sind, müssen eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} bestehen oder sich sofort 3 Felder in Richtung dieses Punktes bewegen. Die Ziele bewegen sich auch dann, wenn sie {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}betäubt{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}gelähmt{/g} sind.

Alle Gegner in einem Radius von 6 Feldern um den Zielpunkt müssen eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} bestehen oder sich sofort 3 Felder in Richtung dieses Punktes bewegen. Die Ziele bewegen sich auch dann, wenn sie {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}betäubt{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}gelähmt{/g} sind.

languages.text: Tous les ennemis situés dans un rayon de 6 cases autour du point cible, et jusqu'à 12 cases du navigateur, doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} ou parcourir immédiatement 3 cases en direction de ce point. Les cibles se déplacent même si elles sont {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}étourdies{/g} ou {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilisées{/g}.
languages.original_text: All enemies in a 6-cell radius around the target point, up to 12 cells away from the Navigator, must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or immediately move 3 cells toward that point. The targets move even if they are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Tous les ennemis situés dans un rayon de 6 cases autour du point cible, et jusqu'à 12 cases du navigateur, doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} ou parcourir immédiatement 3 cases en direction de ce point. Les cibles se déplacent même si elles sont {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}étourdies{/g} ou {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilisées{/g}.

languages.text: 指定地点の周囲半径6セル以内（航宙士からの距離12セル以内）のすべての敵は、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WIL{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に成功しなければ、指定地点に向かって3セル移動する。{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}気絶状態{/g}または{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}であっても移動する。
languages.original_text: All enemies in a 6-cell radius around the target point, up to 12 cells away from the Navigator, must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or immediately move 3 cells toward that point. The targets move even if they are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 指定地点の周囲半径6セル以内（航宙士からの距離12セル以内）のすべての敵は、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WIL{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に成功しなければ、指定地点に向かって3セル移動する。{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}気絶状態{/g}または{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}であっても移動する。

languages.text: All enemies in a 6-cell radius around the target point up to 12 cells away must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or immediately move 3 cells toward that point. The targets move even if they are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.

traits.locale_text: All enemies in a 6-cell radius around the target point up to 12 cells away must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or immediately move 3 cells toward that point. The targets move even if they are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.

languages.text: Hedef noktasının etrafındaki 6 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan ve Rotacı'dan en fazla 12 hücre uzakta olan tüm düşmanlar, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde o noktaya doğru 3 hücre ilerlerler. Hedefler, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}sersemlemiş{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}felç{/g} olmuş olsalar da ilerlerler.
languages.original_text: All enemies in a 6-cell radius around the target point, up to 12 cells away from the Navigator, must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or immediately move 3 cells toward that point. The targets move even if they are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Hedef noktasının etrafındaki 6 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan ve Rotacı'dan en fazla 12 hücre uzakta olan tüm düşmanlar, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde o noktaya doğru 3 hücre ilerlerler. Hedefler, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}sersemlemiş{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}felç{/g} olmuş olsalar da ilerlerler.
